game_description: A collection of several of our recent Virtual Operations Environment demonstration projects, available in English and Brazilian Portuguese. The Illegal Fishing Environment highlights controls for presenting vessel information in a 3D view allowing new ways of quickly highlighting temporal data. The satellite globe helps users to start to understand the satellite paths and get a feel for the distances involved with satellite trajectories. The utility environment highlights Brazil's electrical system. The Virtual Security Operations Environment allows security staff to quickly get an interactive overview of issues on the entire property. Users can select feeds and instantly see where an incident is occurring on the property. Large physical control rooms contribute to large operational costs. The VizworX Virtual Operations Environment framework assists operations and control centers with their digital transformation. For more information, we can be contacted at VizworX.com.
review_1: Allows you to virtualize operations or control centers, collaborate instantly with remote participants and allows you to customize your own control center. Highly recommended!
review_2: It was really interesting to see a demo of how VR could be used for virtual work environments! The fishing one is particularly interesting with the 3d boat paths.
